title: BccKing
author: BccKing
content: Cryptocurrency pioneers, nice to meet you, this is my dad's account.He is a dedicated promoter of the crypto community. He used to explain Bitcoin to me when I was a kid. He watched Bitcoin come into being and grow. Because Bitcoin was too expensive to target for long-term storage, he often remorse. Many times he lost money by investing in cheaper altcoins, and the chronic stress of family life and work overload left him depressed.I read the discussion on the development of Bitcoin in the early days of the forum, and felt very magical and incredible. This is a great invention, a great era. When Bitcoin was born, I was a 7-year-old ignorant girl, and I also missed it. got it.We weren't there when shells were money, we weren't there when gold was there, we weren't there when cars were there, and I wasn't there when electricity was there. Those who can mine 50BTC or 25BTC in one block, you are the luckiest!The developers of the Bitcoin community, a group of young geniuses, who did not want to have fun when they were young, but got into the field of cryptography and created a great Bitcoin. For their ideals and beliefs, I adore them very much!I hate altcoins, they made my dad lose money and they are just imitating bitcoin, a lot of altcoins are just to scam money and then disappear, and the real king is bitcoin. So I call on everyone to join me and only believe in Bitcoin, abandon those altcoins that cheat money, and just follow it!

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: BccKing on August 17, 2022, 07:56:44 AMCryptocurrency pioneers, nice to meet you, this is my dad's account.Welcome to the forum!Since this is your dad's account it may be a better idea to start your new account.With differences in knowledge and other aspects you may be accused of buying or stealing accounts, or you may be accused of shitposting for asking newbie questions from a 5 years old account. Just saying.Quote from: BccKing on August 17, 2022, 07:56:44 AMWhen Bitcoin was born, I was a 7-year-old ignorant girl, and I also missed it.Bitcoin is still very young, you didn't really miss it. Don't look back to the past, look towards the future. It may be much better.Quote from: BccKing on August 17, 2022, 07:56:44 AMwe weren't there when cars were there, and I wasn't there when electricity was thereThis I don't understand.Quote from: BccKing on August 17, 2022, 07:56:44 AMThose who can mine 50BTC or 25BTC in one block, you are the luckiest!Most of those didn't understand the value of Bitcoin and spent, wasted or lost that long ago.I think that those who bought at 1$ or so may be in a better position. Of course, there are just speculations. Quote from: BccKing on August 17, 2022, 07:56:44 AMI hate altcoins, they made my dad lose moneyHate is not healthy. But avoiding them may actually be Again, welcome to the forum and enjoy the ride!

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Altcoin scam comes from coins that are mined before a project is launched, the coins are sold before listing the it on exchanges, the developers can leave the project on the day it supposed to be launched and take away all investor money. Some developers can just list the coin and sell all their coins which they have from the beginning, making investors to lose in the dumping process that can make the project become useless and having no future. Going for bitcoin is better to avoid scam.

comments.author: Uang_kartal
comments.body: I agree with  NeuroticFish that being your true self should make you more comfortable and can be known by the many contributors who may struggle with you before. I may be more than you feel if I regret the backwardness of knowing the forum and bitcoin. My principle is that when I can't exchange fiat money, I can look for bounties and signature services here. actually altcoins also have many phases and choices and I don't regret being a child yesterday afternoon. Thank you for sharing your story about your past and your father's.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Quote from: BccKing on August 17, 2022, 07:56:44 AMBecause Bitcoin was too expensive to target for long-term storage, he often remorse. Storing or holding Bitcoin doesn't cost you any money except the price of buying a hardware wallet or purchasing and setting up a proper cold storage. After that, it doesn't matter if you have 0.1 BTC or 100 BTC. Unless, of course, your father was using some weird centralized service that charged him for keeping coins in their wallets/vaults/whatever.Quote from: BccKing on August 17, 2022, 07:56:44 AM...a lot of altcoins are just to scam money and then disappear... Don't forget their purpose of making their creators and developers rich. That's the ultimate goal and it's closely connected to tricking investors into putting money into such projects.Quote from: NeuroticFish on August 17, 2022, 08:41:16 AMThis I don't understand. I think she was trying to say that this generation wasn't around when electricity was invented, when the first cars were created, when shells were used as money, etc. But we are here now to see the evolution of Bitcoin.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: Pmalek on August 17, 2022, 09:12:18 AMQuote from: NeuroticFish on August 17, 2022, 08:41:16 AMThis I don't understand. I think she was trying to say that this generation wasn't around when electricity was invented, when the first cars were created, when shells were used as money, etc. But we are here now to see the evolution of Bitcoin.OK, if one was around when there was the gold rush or when the first Bitcoin blocks were mined easily and cheap, I would understand to be seen as a loss. But for the first cars or the electricity... nothing really big to monetize (unless I am missing something).

comments.author: Rockstarguy
comments.body: Do not have regret that you didn’t have access to bitcoin when you were young,  I think this is your time to be a bitcoiner and the opportunity is always their for everyone that comes to know bitcoin. Bitcoin is the best and the only cryptocurrency I can think of that is safe to acquire,  other altcoins are nothing but full of imitations trying to be like bitcoin. If anyone should decide to invest in cryptocurrency  it is risky to invest more in altcoins because they are not always reliable.

comments.author: samuraijin
comments.body: That is the risk that will be accepted for traders and investors, at least analyzing it is important not just relying on lust to buy, at least looking at the aspects before investing, it is already very difficult to target bitcoin, especially ETH, both of them are already very difficult to have more income from investment, often there is panic that finally everyone gets affected, maybe ordinary people will not believe in the progress of the world today..

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: At some point in live, we all have several chances to make effective use of an opportunity but missed it because of disbelieves, fear and personal arrogance, but in bitcoin the good therein is that an opportunity never end or cease from existence as long as you remain focus with what you're doing, study the digital currency, have a good knowledge and pursue a holding for it, the other side effects that alter most people's mindset is the misconception they had with bitcoin and altcoins, they assume all to be thesame, of course they may since they all fall under cryptocurrency but not all crypto worth the standard of a digital currency aside bitcoin.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Quote from: NeuroticFish on August 17, 2022, 08:41:16 AMQuote from: BccKing on August 17, 2022, 07:56:44 AMQuote from: BccKing on August 17, 2022, 07:56:44 AMWhen Bitcoin was born, I was a 7-year-old ignorant girl, and I also missed it.Bitcoin is still very young, you didn't really miss it. Don't look back to the past, look towards the future. It may be much better.I too agree on this fact.It’s not so late to enter into the Bitcoins ecosystem, and if you see the price currently then Bitcoins are at a great price to buy and hold.If OP manages to buy some Bitcoins and store for a year , then definitely he might see double profit of his investment.At last we need to learn the lesson that never we should buy shitty altcoins in order to get quick profits in shorter period of time.

After that, it doesn't matter if you have 0.1 BTC or 100 BTC. Unless, of course, your father was using some weird centralized service that charged him for keeping coins in their wallets/vaults/whatever.Quote from: BccKing on August 17, 2022, 07:56:44 AM...a lot of altcoins are just to scam money and then disappear... That's the ultimate goal and it's closely connected to tricking investors into putting money into such projects.Quote from: NeuroticFish on August 17, 2022, 08:41:16 AMThis I don't understand. I think she was trying to say that this generation wasn't around when electricity was invented, when the first cars were created, when shells were used as money, etc. But we are here now to see the evolution of Bitcoin.When shells are used as money,When the first piece of gold was extracted and used as money,When electricity and automobiles were invented,I wasn't born yet,I was young when Bitcoin was invented,Therefore, I am very envious of the early Bitcoin miners, who can mine 50BTC per blockThey were lucky, I don't seem so lucky!Quote from: Rockstarguy on August 17, 2022, 09:49:29 AMDo not have regret that you didn’t have access to bitcoin when you were young,  I think this is your time to be a bitcoiner and the opportunity is always their for everyone that comes to know bitcoin. If anyone should decide to invest in cryptocurrency  it is risky to invest more in altcoins because they are not always reliable. Yes, Bitcoin is the most trusted cryptocurrency[moderator's note: consecutive posts merged]

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: @BccKing : you should read the forum rules and stop spamming with separate replies for everybody.All those replies should have been sitting in one big post.

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: Since this is Bitcointalk.org or Bitcoin forum, it's stupid if there's a user who don't believe in Bitcoin. I mean, why in the first place he joined this forum, if he's not believe in Bitcoin. I believe he will either spread FUDs or lies and blame about Bitcoin.Quote from: BccKing on August 17, 2022, 01:47:03 PMThank you for your reply, the use of this account is with his consent, and he will not come here to post in the future.Does this mean your dad will never use this account again and now you're the one who have full control about this account (BccKing) ? I will wait for your answer.Quote from: NeuroticFish on August 17, 2022, 02:03:02 PM@BccKing : you should read the forum rules and stop spamming with separate replies for everybody.All those replies should have been sitting in one big post.Soon her post will be merged by the moderators since I already report her post.

The misunderstanding caused by the translation software. He trusts Bitcoin very much, but does not invest in Bitcoin. He feels that the unit price of Bitcoin is very expensive. He has invested in a lot of altcoins and caused losses. He regrets it.2. He has passed away, and he gave me this account. If I re-register a new account, I am worried that there will be restrictions on speech, so I use this account.

comments.author: BccKing
comments.body: Quote from: NeuroticFish on August 17, 2022, 02:03:02 PM@BccKing : you should read the forum rules and stop spamming with separate replies for everybody.All those replies should have been sitting in one big post.ok, thanks for the reminder, i don't understand the forum rules yet

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: Quote from: BccKing on August 17, 2022, 02:15:35 PM2. He has passed away, and he gave me this account. If I re-register a new account, I am worried that there will be restrictions on speech, so I use this account.Sorry to hear that, but you must create a new account since everyone know this account was used by your dad, not you.

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Why don’t you create your own account, sounds like you are very interested in bitcoin and chatting about it. Some or what you wrote is kind of confusing and I’m not sure entirely accuracy (cryptographers who helped build bitcoin have fun just the same as anyone else). One thing I will mention though is altcoins didn’t make your dad lose money, he lost the money on his own. There are risk to investing in highly volatile assets, in this case coins, especially when if you read all of their white papers, is clear to see they mostly all provide no utility, therefore it’s a complete lottery ticket you’re hoping someone pumps up for you. Also some alts aren’t bitcoin competition..coins like Ethereum are smart contract based coins that do entirely different things.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Quote from: Apocollapse on August 17, 2022, 02:59:05 PMSorry to hear that, but you must create a new account since everyone know this account was used by your dad, not you.There is no need to create a new forum account, if it was given to you legitimately by the previous owner. For example, Hal Finney's kids allegedly also have the password to his bitcointalk account.I advise that you revise your negative tag to neutral.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: You keep stating how unlucky you are not to have gotten the chance to mine when the block rewards were 50 and 25 BTC respectively. But I doubt you would have mined bitcoin in those early days. The userbase was a lot smaller back then and no one could have predicted that it would explode the way it did. And even if you did mine some, who is to say that you wouldn't have sold it long time ago the first time those coins' value jumped up by 50% or 100%?!Focus on today and forget about missed opportunities. You have now become a part of a group of investors, backers, and advocates that use this digital currency and see the benefits of doing so. That's what you should focus on. Find a way to earn it and keep them coming.

comments.author: dlightag
comments.body: When you wake up is your morning in every business, at your initial point of view from your dad telling you about Bitcoin while you're on dream point and now you realized that Bitcoin has come to reality in real life, which soon or later Bitcoin price may hit 100k or above as it predicted early, Hence still have chance to invest Bitcoin in future return profit.
